data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Incoming Invoice Items'
define view entity zetr_ddl_i_incoming_invitem
  as select from zetr_t_icini
  association to parent zetr_ddl_i_incoming_invoices as _incomingInvoices on $projection.DocumentUUID = _incomingInvoices.DocumentUUID
{
  key docui as DocumentUUID,
  key linno as LineNumber,
      mdesc as MaterialDescription,
      descr as Description,
      mdlnm as ModelName,
      brand as Brand,
      buyii as BuyerItemIdentification,
      selii as SellerItemIdentification,
      manii as ManufacturerItemIdentification,
      netpr as Price,
      disrt as DiscountRate,
      disam as DiscountAmount,
      wrbtr as Amount,
      fwste as TaxAmount,
      taxrt as TaxRate,
      waers as Currency,
      menge as Quantity,
      meins as UnitofMeasure,
      _incomingInvoices // Make association public
}
